GlimpseAbstractConsumer - Class in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.consumer
This class represent a generic implementation of the interface GlimpseConsumer.
It provides for extension, the abstract method: GlimpseAbstractConsumer.messageReceived(Message)

GlimpseAbstractConsumer(Properties, String) - Constructor for class it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.consumer.GlimpseAbstractConsumer
This constructor allow to create a GlimpseAbstractConsumer object
providing the GlimpseAbstractConsumer.settings properties and a String object that will be
automatically converted to a ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument object.
GlimpseAbstractConsumer(Properties, ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument) - Constructor for class it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.consumer.GlimpseAbstractConsumer
This constructor allow to create a GlimpseAbstractConsumer object
providing the GlimpseAbstractConsumer.settings properties and a ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument object.
GlimpseAbstractProbe - Class in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.probe
This class represent a generic implementation of the interface GlimpseProbe.
It provides the abstract method: GlimpseAbstractProbe.sendMessage(GlimpseBaseEvent, boolean)
that can be extended if needed.
GlimpseAbstractProbe(Properties) - Constructor for class it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.probe.GlimpseAbstractProbe
This constructor allow to create a GlimpseAbstractProbe object
providing the Properties settings object
GlimpseBaseEvent<T> - Interface in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.event
The GlimpseBaseEvent is the generic basic event that the monitoring infrastructure
uses to infer more complex events.
GlimpseBaseEventAbstract<T> - Class in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.event
This class is a possible implementation (extension) of the GlimpseBaseEvent class.

This implementation refer to a CONNECT project scenario.

GlimpseConsumer - Interface in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.consumer
Implementing this interface to create a communication with the monitoring Enabler.

It is possible to use a generic implementation of the consumer using or extending the class GlimpseAbstractConsumer However, implementing this interface the behaviour of the consumer must respect the following actions:

Send a TextMessage that contains the Xml generated following the ComplexEventRequest schema

The message must be sent on the jms://serviceTopic channel.
The consumer must listen for the response of the monitoring infrastructure that will send a jms TextMessage containing the response channel where to connect to listen for the evaluation results.
The text contained into the TextMessage sent from the monitoring infrastructure
is "AnswerTopic ==TOPICNAMEWHERETOCONNECTTO"

To create in a simple way the XML that define the request, you can use the class ComplexEventRuleActionListDocument.
Possible XML actions are: Insert Delete Start Stop Restart.

The payload (the field RuleBody of the ComplexEventRuleType object) of
a well-structured ComplexEventRule message, actually, must contains a Drools rule.
For more details about Drools Rule, see the exampleRule.xml.
************************************************************************
*******An usage example is available here MyGlimpseConsumer********
************************************************************************

GlimpseProbe - Interface in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.probe
The interface GlimpseProbe contains the event that a generic probe
must implement to generate events.
GlimpseProbeInterface - Interface in it.cnr.isti.labsedc.glimpse.probe
The interface GlimpseProbeInterface contains the event that a generic probe
must implement to generate events.
